name: Lost Orbit (itch)
description:
This is a visual novel made in 48h for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 using Elm.

The story revolves around your recent arrival aboard a space station with a friend from the academy, you both spend the day meeting the new characters before deciding who you'll be sharing your living quarters with for the rest of your time here.

Art is all by @angleraptor

Music is by @fishsticks_1312

Programming by Gui/Goose Long
